name: chai-json-schema-ajv
description: A chai plugin for validate json schema.

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-v4 && npm run test-v5 && npm run test-v6 && npm run test-latest
scripts.test-v4: npm i ajv@4 --no-save && nyc mocha test/unit
scripts.test-v5: npm i ajv@5 --no-save && nyc mocha test/unit
scripts.test-v6: npm i ajv@6 --no-save && nyc mocha test/unit
scripts.test-latest: npm remove ajv && npm i ajv --no-save && nyc mocha test/unit
scripts.test-node6: docker run --rm -v ${PWD}:/app -w /app node:6-alpine npm i eslint@6 --no-save && npm test
scripts.test-node8: docker run --rm -v ${PWD}:/app -w /app node:8-alpine npm i eslint@6 --no-save && npm test

author: up9cloud (https://github.com/up9cloud)
